room_title: Escape room "Slime Factory" by Mad Escape in Philadelphia
review: This was my first Escape room and my niece's 4th. We both had a blast. My daughter also did the Slime factory, and she tells everyone how much fun she had! The staff was amazing and friendly and the Bank heist was challenging, but doable.

room_title: Escape room "Slime Factory" by Mad Escape in Philadelphia
review: Great place to have fun with friends and family. Had my Doughter’s birthday party in the slime factory. The kids had a ball , and I just booked my other Doughter’s party . Great service . And they gave her a free slime factory shirt and a goody bag .

room_title: Escape room "Slime Factory" by Mad Escape in Philadelphia
review: Super fun time in the Slime Factory!!!
